At present, there are problems in the project that the license header is not uniform and missing. Need a way to help developers automatically add and format license header.
There are two major options to automatically add license headers to source files:
* Mojo License Maven plugin from codehaus
* Mycila Maven License plugin from mycila

1.  codehaus used in our projects is mainly used to check third-party dependencies license and defined in licenseCheck profile（not default build plugin）.It can be reused and updated license header，ref to [update-file-header](https://www.mojohaus.org/license-maven-plugin/update-file-header-mojo.html#projectName). It automatically supports [cddl_v1, gpl_v3, mit, gpl_v2, gpl_v1, fdl_v1_3, epl_v2, epl_v1, epl_only_v2, epl_only_v1, agpl_v3, lgpl_v3, lgpl_v2_1, apache_v2, eupl_v1_1, bsd_3, bsd_2] license.Here our apache_v2 header is different from our ASF header, so we can't use the existing one directly. We need to define our header using licenseResolver, but here we need to define each module and fixed file name, ref to [example-add-license](https://www.mojohaus.org/license-maven-plugin/examples/example-add-license.html). so I think that the codehaus plugin is difficult to use as an update license header.

2. Mycila is indeed almost three years away from the last update, but its corresponding [github](https://github.com/mycila/license-maven-plugin) was updated 4 months ago. The current version of mycila is 3.0. I think its function is clear for a plugin. At present, the function of updating license header is undoubtedly satisfied.

3.  [rat plugin](https://creadur.apache.org/rat/apache-rat-plugin/index.html) just check license header but not update and format license header.I hope there is a plugin that automatically helps developers format their license header.

I think it can be divided into two steps for the existing problems.
- Firstly, add or format the license header for the existing source file, but not include the plugin itself.
- Secondly, discuss how to use the plugin to help us automatically add and format the license header in the project.

@CrazyHZM  I have send one PR

Are you have set right `clients(TCP connection)` for consumer. Default only one client (shareClients) between consumer and provider.

You can change like a blow:

```xml
 <!-- connections is the tcp connection between consumer and provider -->
 <!-- use connections to config-->
 <dubbo:consumer connections="3" timeout="3000" retries="0" check="false"/>
```

我认为是没有正确的设置 consumer 与 provider 直接的 TCP 来接数，dubbo 默认使用一个TCP 链接，如果TCP 连接太少，大多的数据的请求都是被阻塞的在 consumer ,不能快速的把请求发送到服务端，导致压力测试的不准确。

你可以用上面的配置试试。看是否有效果。最好可以把你的 consumer 和 provider 的配置都贴出来看下。
@PCMD-T  see #4198
此外 consumer 的超时时间也要设置。

请问下压测使用的服务器是什么，是tomcat 还是其他？如果是 tomcat 它的线程设置是多少？

如果你用的是 tomcat，那么一个请求的的请求路径
```
 请求 -> tomcat(N个线程)  -> consumer  (N个线程) -> provider(M 个线程)
```
从上面的图可以看出 consumer 线程数，其实是依赖 tomcat 的线程数的，tomcat 的线程数越多，那么 consumer 处理请求的速度就越快 。

dubbo 中并没有对 consumer 进行线程的异步处理，只是在 provider 使用了线程池，进行了请求的异步处理。

1. If you use thrift,  use native-thrift directly. I don't know the thrift but only know native thrift.  refer to : http://dubbo.apache.org/zh-cn/docs/user/references/protocol/thrift.html.  

2. I think we have two ways to implements. 
2.1 You can introduce gRpc, and the protocl , transport and serialization are managed with gRpc. 

引入gRPC，gRPC负责了协议，通信等所有的事情。

2.2 You can refer to gRPC, and you implement the [Http/2](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/master/doc/PROTOCOL-HTTP2.md).  Finally, you can invoke between the dubbo app used gRpc protocol and the gRpc app.

2. After the blow, fallback uses the dubbo mock

> I agree with having a common and standard way to handle license header.
> 
> There are three thing need discuss:
> 
> 1. what kind of format we agree to use (I see this PR has lots of line remove).
> 2. what benefit this kind of plugin can provide and what's the process after we introduce license plugin? should we run plugin before create PR?
> 3. does most of open source project use similar plugin? what's the difference between different kind of license plugin (mycila, Mojo etc)
> 
> I believe it's a good idea to use tool to automatic some manual stuff, but before we apply this change we need know the benefit and the possible impact for workflow (README, CONTRIBUTE doc may change too)
> 
> I suggest to start a discuss in maillist @slievrly and we may can get some help and information from community

1.  The removed line is a blank line between the license header and the package. We need to specify whether we need to keep a blank line between the license header and the package. If you want to keep it, you need to define it in the template file, and it will also increase the blank line of many files. In short, we need to specify this format, all files will be strictly matched.

2. The mycila license plugin in this pr is used as the default bulid plugin, bound to the generate-sources phase of maven. So when we finish writing the code locally and do the maven compile check, it can automatically check the headers of all source files, add the headers that don't exist, and update the headers with incorrect formats.

3. For auto add and format licence headers, mojo is harder to use than mycila, and it needs to be defined separately for each module. Mojo is suitable for checking the licenses of third-party dependencies. mycila does not have this feature.

I will start a discussion with the community via mail group later.

I think the `DubboSerialization` was deleted.

You catch exception because the `DubboSerialization` deleted. Dubbo can`t find the SPI in the classpath. 

You can write one by yourself

You can copy  `DubboSerialization` to your project.

write config like this

> fileName

META-INF/dubbo/com.alibaba.dubbo.common.serialize.Serialization

> file content

```
dubbo=your.package.name.DubboSerialization 
```

config xml

```xml
<dubbo:protocol serialization="dubbo" />
```

You can find SPI usage here [SPI serialize](http://dubbo.apache.org/zh-cn/docs/dev/impls/serialize.html)

I think Dubbo use `clazz.getConstructor()` to check wheater if a no-arguments constructor in you customer extension. If no exception will cause.

```java
public static boolean isGeneric(String generic) {
        return generic != null
                && !"".equals(generic)
                && (GENERIC_SERIALIZATION_DEFAULT.equalsIgnoreCase(generic)  /* Normal generalization cal */
                || GENERIC_SERIALIZATION_NATIVE_JAVA.equalsIgnoreCase(generic) /* Streaming generalization call supporting jdk serialization */
                || GENERIC_SERIALIZATION_BEAN.equalsIgnoreCase(generic)
                || GENERIC_SERIALIZATION_PROTOBUF.equalsIgnoreCase(generic));
    }
```

并发和耗时的问题，辛苦帮忙看下是不是支持下，不然要在consumer端建线程池去异步初始化一致性hash的map

1. 50ms 的超时时间实在是太短了吧。你什么业务能保证在50ms 内完成？这个时间不符合实际。
2. consumer 第一次在调用的时候，肯定是要对 loadbalance 进行初始化的，如果设置了几千个 `hash.codes` 和 provider 有几千的时候，第一次耗时肯定会需要比较久的时间的。可以自定义一个loadbalance 同时用一个标记来标记 virtualInvokers 是否初始化完成(初始化过程可设置成异步的，用一个线程来处理)如果没有初始化完成，就随机一个 invoker.如果初始化完成了，那么走select 逻辑去进行hash 选择。这样可以避免第一次耗时过久的问题。
3. Dubbo 原始的 ConsistentHashLoadBalance 没发现有并非的问题呐。。
